data.name: Any World
data.detailed_description:
You will embark on an exciting adventure together with an alien named Ottis, who came to the planet Emria to study it!
You will find:
  • A fascinating story
  • Lots of puzzles
  • A huge number of tasks and quests
  • A completely open and seamless world and much more in Any World.
So what are you waiting for? Rather, go on a journey to new worlds and planets!

{steam_app_image}/extras/2022-06-13_15-04-50.gif

Updates will be released every 1-2 months, both large and small. Bug fixes, various events: winter, summer, Halloween and so on.

data.short_description: Run, jump, fight!Solve puzzles, complete quests and do a lot of crazy things in Any World worlds.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
